_sText:
-=surf_lessons made by [WF] Helix=-

This map was ment to be released for my clanmembers only, but I decided to release it publically instead so other people can learn how to surf in a playful way aswell.
This is my first map ever.

-The basics-

The map is designed to teach you who to surf. You can find questionmarks on every surf stage. When you stand inside of this, full instructions will be given to you, telling you how to complete a stage.
There are 7 stages, advancing in difficulty. When you complete the map, you will be teleported back to the spawn where you can pick a bonus stage to practice surfing on a higher difficulty level.
Please note that the map has no jail or anything. This will give you unlimited surfing time.

-Bonus stages-

The bonus stages need to be activated before you can play them. You can do this by pressing secret buttons that are hidden somewhere in the 7 lessonstages. There is a total of 3. They are hidden and invisible. Once pressed, the teleporter at the spawn to the dedicated bonus stage will be activated. When pressing such button, you will be notified which stage is unlocked.
Can you find them?


I hope you will have fun, and of course that you will learn something from this.
If you have any questions or comments, feel free to message me over Xfire by adding me as a friend under the name ''gforce2314''

Cheers.
